MainArticle.title: Translate simple title and intro
MainArticle.intro: We now create our translation files inside the assets/i18n folder:
MainArticle.text: In app.component.html we add a header with the translate “directive” inside the “h1” tag. This directive will take the text inside the tag and replace it with the matching translation. If you use the directive you have to make sure, that there is nothing else inside the tag but the text.
